attributes.additional_details:
M4 relief road- £114 million spent, a 3 year public enquiry examining 28 alternatives. Recommendation that the only way to relieve congestion is to build the road. This is rejected by the 1st Minister who sets up a 6 month commission to examine the same alternatives that have already been rejected.

Majority vote in Wales in favour of EU exit. Assembly declares itself Remain.

Circuit Of Wales cancelled due to Assembly inaction
attributes.background: The Welsh Assembly has shown again and again that it is unfit for purpose. As a proud Welshman I sadly see that it has become a talking shop to provide the Labour party with jobs for the boys and it is totally out of touch with the wishes of the people of Wales
